title: Recipes For Revenge, A Four-Course Novel
description: A collection of tales about men behaving badly and women plotting revenge. In the first course, a self-absorbed underachiever of an employer lights a fire under Gloria Davis' inner demon. Devilish ideas and public humiliation alter her recipe for jalape√±o poppers.Childhood scars are finally picked clean when Roberta Butler decides to stop her Uncle Lester's cycle of abuse with a special batch of potato salad. The family picnic will never be the same.The third course offers a tale about a sexy cowboy who uses his fists to get his way. He'll pay the ultimate price because Texas Chili Cook-off Champion, Chicki Torres was the wrong girl to bully.Tessa Arlington's downstairs neighbor turns her perfect apartment into a prison and her happy outlook sour. Fear can lead a girl to do unthinkable things, especially when she's baking cookies. It's interesting what a girl can do with common household cleaning products.
author: Gina Marie Barlean
